Title: Kent & Stowe 70100441 Pruning Saw K/S70100441
Description:
The Kent & Stowe Pruning Saw is ideal for removing mature wood on larger plants and cutting large branches. It has a curved carbon steel blade that has been precisely filed for fast and effective cutting. Sharp triple, ground teeth for efficient cutting of wet and green live wood.

It predominantly cuts on the back stroke to minimise the effort required.

Specification

Cutting Diameter: 254mm
Blade Length: 460mm
Guarantee: 5 years

Kent & Stowe
